meanings.definition: A small, nocturnal marsupial native to Australia.
meanings.sent1: Bilbies are cute animals that come out at night.
meanings.sent2: I saw a group of bilbies hopping around in the dark.
meanings.sent3: The bilbies had a secret party under the stars.
meanings.sent4: In the shadows, the bilbies moved like silent ghosts.
meanings.sent5: The tiny bilbies peeked out from their burrows, curious and shy.

meanings.definition: The plural form of the word 'bilby'.
meanings.sent1: Look at all the bilbies running around in the zoo!
meanings.sent2: The bilbies in the exhibit were playful and energetic.
meanings.sent3: The bilbies decided to form a band and play music together.
meanings.sent4: The field was filled with bilbies, a sea of furry creatures.
meanings.sent5: Children giggled as they watched the bilbies playfully chase each other.
